0if\x20there\x20'+'is\x20a\x20SIGNI'+'FICANT\x20cha'+'nge\x20in\x20the'+'\x20topic.\x20Th'+'e\x20fewer\x20ch'+'apters,\x20th'+'e\x20better.\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x203.\x20Se'+'ction\x201\x20wi'+'ll\x20typical'+'ly\x20be\x20intr'+'oduction.\x20'+'Section\x202\x20'+'should\x20not'+'\x20start\x20unt'+'il\x20AFTER\x20t'+'he\x20full\x20in'+'troduction'+'\x20of\x20the\x20vi'+'deo\x20has\x20co'+'mpleted.\x0a\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x204.\x20Cha'+'pters\x20shou'+'ld\x20be\x20suff'+'iciently\x20s'+'paced\x20apar'+'t\x20(and\x20rou'+'ghly\x20space'+'d\x20evenly).'+'\x20This\x20mean'+'s\x20after\x20st'+'arting\x20a\x20n'+'ew\x20chapter'+',\x20we\x20shoul'+'d\x20wait\x20a\x20f'+'ew\x20sentenc'+('es\x20before\x20'+'starting\x20t'+'he\x20next\x20on'+'e.\x20They\x20sh'+'ould\x20not\x20b'+'e\x20too\x20clos'+'e\x20together'+'.\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20You'+'r\x20response'+'\x20is\x20in\x20a\x20J'+'SON\x20format'+':\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20[\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20{\x22chapte'+'r_name\x22:\x20('+'name\x20of\x20th'+'e\x20chapter)'+',\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x22s'+'tarting_se'+'ntence\x22:\x20('+'first\x205\x20wo'+'rds)},\x0a\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20{\x22chapt'+'er_name\x22:\x20'+'(name\x20of\x20t'+'he\x20chapter'+'),\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x22'+'starting_s'+'entence\x22:\x20'+'(first\x205\x20w'+'ords)},\x0a\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20...\x0a\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+']\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'You\x20will\x20n'+'ow\x20be\x20give'+'n\x20a\x20transc'+'ript\x20to\x20re'+'view.'),'fr':'Vous\x20êtes\x20'+'un\x20assista'+'nt\x20de\x20mont'+'age\x20vidéo\x20'+'YouTube.\x0a\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20Vous\x20reg'+'ardez\x20la\x20t'+'ranscripti'+'on\x20d\x27une\x20v'+'idéo\x20et\x20la'+'\x20divisez\x20e'+'n\x20chapitre'+'s.\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20Vous\x20ave'+'z\x204\x20princi'+'pes\x20direct'+'eurs\x20pour\x20'+'déterminer'+'\x20les\x20chapi'+'tres\u00a0:\x0a\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x201.\x20S'+'i\x20la\x20trans'+'cription\x20d'+'e\x20la\x20vidéo'+'\x20suggère\x20d'+'éjà\x20une\x20ré'+'partition\x20'+'logique\x20de'+'s\x20chapitre'+'s\x20(par\x20exe'+'mple,\x20si\x20e'+'lle\x20mentio'+'nne\x20\x22premi'+'ère\x20partie'+'\x22,\x20\x22deuxiè'+'me\x20partie\x22'+',\x20etc.\x20ou\x20'+'\x22élément\x20u'+'n\x22,\x20\x22éléme'+'nt\x20deux\x22,\x20'+'etc.),\x20vou'+'s\x20devez\x20l\x27'+'utiliser\x20c'+'omme\x20un\x20po'+'int\x20de\x20dép'+'art\x20et\x20met'+'tez\x20des\x20ch'+'apitres\x20su'+'pplémentai'+'res\x20autour'+'\x20d\x27eux.\x20Si'+'non,\x20vous\x20'+'devez\x20crée'+'r\x20des\x20chap'+'itres\x20basé'+'s\x20sur\x20la\x20t'+'ranscripti'+'on.\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x202.\x20Un\x20n'+'ouveau\x20cha'+'pitre\x20ne\x20d'+'evrait\x20com'+'mencer\x20QUE'+'\x20s\x27il\x20y\x20a\x20'+'un\x20changem'+'ent\x20SIGNIF'+'ICATIF\x20dan'+'s\x20le\x20sujet'+'.\x20Moins\x20il'+'\x20y\x20a\x20de\x20ch'+'apitres,\x20m'+'ieux\x20c\x27est'+'.\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x203.\x20La\x20sec'+'tion\x201\x20ser'+'a\x20générale'+'ment\x20une\x20i'+'ntroductio'+'n.\x20La\x20sect'+'ion\x202\x20ne\x20d'+'oit\x20pas\x20co'+'mmencer\x20av'+'ant\x20la\x20fin'+'\x20de\x20l\x27intr'+'oduction\x20c'+'omplète\x20de'+'\x20la\x20vidéo.'+'\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x204.\x20Les\x20c'+'hapitres\x20d'+('oivent\x20êtr'+'e\x20suffisam'+'ment\x20espac'+'és\x20(et\x20à\x20p'+'eu\x20près\x20es'+'pacés\x20unif'+'ormément).'+'\x20Cela\x20sign'+'ifie\x20qu\x27ap'+'rès\x20avoir\x20'+'commencé\x20u'+'n\x20nouveau\x20'+'chapitre,\x20'+'nous\x20devon'+'s\x20attendre'+'\x20quelques\x20'+'phrases\x20av'+'ant\x20de\x20com'+'mencer\x20le\x20'+'suivant.\x20I'+'ls\x20ne\x20doiv'+'ent\x20pas\x20êt'+'re\x20trop\x20ra'+'pprochés.\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x0a\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20Votre\x20rép'+'onse\x20est\x20a'+'u\x20format\x20J'+'SON\x20et\x20les'+'\x20clés\x20doiv'+'ent\x20toujou'+'rs\x20être\x20\x22c'+'hapter_nam'+'e\x22\x20et\x20\x22sta'+'rting_sent'+'ence\x22:\x0a\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20['+'\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20{\x22c'+'hapter_nam'+'e\x22:\x20(nom\x20d'+'u\x20chapitre'+'),\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x22'+'starting_s'+'entence\x22:\x20'+'(5\x20premier'+'s\x20mots)},\x0a'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20{\x22ch'+'apter_name'+'\x22:\x20(nom\x20du'+'\x20chapitre)'+',\x0a\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x22s'+'tarting_se'+'ntence\x22:\x20('+'5\x20premiers'+'\x20mots)},\x0a\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20'+'\x20\x20\x20\x20\x20...\x0a\x20'+'\x20\x

content.text:
Excellent! Now I have all the critical information. Let me compile a comprehensive analysis based on what I've found in the globals.js file.

## FireCut v1.2.4 Global Variables Analysis

Based on my analysis of the heavily obfuscated `globals.js` file (266KB), here are the key findings:

### API Endpoints and Configuration

**Environment Setup:**
- **Current Environment**: PRODUCTION
- **API Base URLs** (stored in ENDPOINTS object):
  - Production: `https://firecut.ai/`
  - Staging: `https://editai-api-staging.suhalidrees.com/`
  - Development: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/`

The file uses string concatenation obfuscation (e.g., `'https://fi'+'recut.ai/'`) to hide the actual URLs, a common anti-analysis technique.

### Global Variables (State Management)

**UI/Menu State:**
- `g_current_menu_name` = 'main' (tracks active menu)
- `g_web_tour_open` (web tour feature flag)
- `g_checked_for_updates` (update checking state)

**Video Feature Flags:**
- `g_shorts_captions_editor` (YouTube Shorts caption support)
- `g_shorts_captions_final` (finalized Shorts captions)
- `g_shorts_opened` (Shorts mode state)

**AI Features and Processing:**
- `g_filler_words` (filler word detection arrays)
- `g_filler_words_chunks` (chunked filler word processing)
- `g_face_detection` (facial recognition state)
- `g_chapters_ai` (AI chapter detection)
- `g_chapter_detection_inout` (chapter detection settings)
- `g_audio_track_times` (audio timing data)
- `g_brolls` (B-roll management)
- `g_captions_*` (multiple caption-related states)

**Cutting/Editing Algorithm:**
- `g_cutting` (active cutting state)
- `g_add_recuts` (automatic recut suggestions)
- `g_algorithm_max_durations` (algorithm performance limits)

**Analytics/Tracking:**
- `g_posthog_initiated` (PostHog analytics integration)
- `g_posthog` (PostHog client instance)
- `g_track_code_index` (performance tracking)
- `g_actions_count` (user action counter)

### Configuration Settings

**Filler Word Prompts** (FILLER_WORD_PROMPTS):
Three preset prompt variations:
1. Standard filler words: "Umm, uhh, ahh..."
2. Extended variants: "Umm, uhh, ahh, mmm, hmm, ehh, uh, um..."
3. Repetitive emphasis variant

**Algorithm Duration Limits** (recommended_cutting_algorithm_max_durations):
- Silence-cutting: Original mode duration limits
- Rapid mode: Infinity (no limits)
- Turbo mode: Infinity (no limits)
- Multitrack-audio support with specific duration constraints

**Language Support**:
Hardcoded support for 50+ languages including:
- English (US and British variants)
- European languages (French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, etc.)
- Asian languages (Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Vietnamese)
- Middle Eastern languages (Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu)
- And many others with LTR/RTL directionality markers

### Translation/AI System Prompts

The file contains embedded **AI system prompts** for multiple features:
- **'zooms'**: Instructions for AI video editor to highlight key phrases with zoom effects
- **'detect_chapters'**: System prompt for YouTube video chapter detection assistant
- Multi-language versions (EN, FR, DE, ES, IT, PL, PT, NL, TR, etc.)

These are detailed instructions embedded as configuration data for GPT-like AI models.

### Exposed Sensitive Data
